item.title: Becoming Who You Are Meant to Be
item.author: drunkensage82@gmail.com (Drunken Sage)
item.description: I have recently come across the work of Bernhard Guenther and Laura Matsue and have been enjoying their podcasts and perspective on the soul awakening/enlightenment journey. This particular podcast episode hits home for myself, as I recently began to understand just how much the false “I” or ego I was actually dealing with. I spent years after my awakening gorging myself on all the spiritual information I could get my hands on.

item.title: It's All Junk
item.author: drunkensage82@gmail.com (Drunken Sage)
item.description: Why is everything I buy a piece of shit? Something I have noticed more and more, is just how terribly everything is built anymore. From furniture, homes, clothing, electronics, you name it….it is all junk!!! For me, this has been pretty obvious, as I have watched product quality decline more and more over my life. But it seems to be hitting all time lows. Recently I decided to be on the lookout for an antique can opener, just because you can’t buy a hand crank can opener anymore that will open even a dozen cans without breaking…one of the many things that still trigger anger in me, and do it pretty quickly!
